metadata.title: CVE-2019-16167 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
sysstat before 12.1.6 has memory corruption due to an Integer Overflow inremap_struct() in sa_common.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16167` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

isag - 12.2.0-2
sysstat - 12.2.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sysstat package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12.2.0-2').
